title: How does ChaiPi work?
description: Chaipi connects you to a broad range of local shops. So, you can have your favourite tea at the tap of a button.
1.  Download the ChaiPi app from your app store.
2. If you have ChaiPi account, you can log in with those details.
3. You'll have to sync your Paytm wallet to the app as a payment method. You could also choose to pay by cash.
4. Choose what you'd like to order.
5. Place your order and follow along as your tea is prepared and delivered!
